## Geometry.getVao() method

Once ready, returns the underlying VertexArrayObject.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getVao(): Promise<WebGLVertexArrayObject>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;WebGLVertexArrayObject&gt;

The underlying VertexArrayObject.
